text: ğŸ¾ğŸ’•New research reveals ageing dog healthcare needs! ğŸ¾ğŸ’•Did you know that many dog owners attribute changes in their older dogs to normal ageing, and therefore may not take them to the vet? ğŸ¤·â€â™€ï¸ This can lead to missed clinical signs and a lack of proper care for our beloved furry friends! ğŸ˜”As a passionate animal lover and advocate for their well-being, I believe it's crucial for us to take action! ğŸ’ª Let's make sure our senior dogs receive the care they deserve by regularly taking them to the vet and being aware of potential health issues. ğŸ¾ğŸ’•The BSAVA PetSavers Ageing Canine Toolkit (ACT) is a fantastic resource for dog owners and veterinary professionals alike! ğŸŒŸ It provides a checklist of common missed clinical signs and offers guidance on how to ensure our ageing dogs live their best lives. ğŸ¾ğŸ’•Let's work together to improve the healthcare of our beloved senior dogs! ğŸ¾ğŸ’• Share your thoughts and experiences in the comments below! ğŸ’¬#AgeingDogs
